from.description: Query only projects updated after the given timestamp

gitForkProtection.description: Specifies whether PRs from Git forks should require a team member's authorization before it can be deployed

limit.description: Limit the number of projects returned

search.description: Search projects by the name field

repo.description: Filter results by repo. Also used for project count

excludeRepos.description: Filter results by excluding those projects that belong to a repo

edgeConfigId.description: Filter results by connected Edge Config ID

edgeConfigTokenId.description: Filter results by connected Edge Config Token ID

teamId.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

slug.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.
